name: iLovePDF
description: A suite of dozens of free PDF tools.
use: Free and no account required. Optional premium upgrades.
limits: No usage limit. Some restrictions on file size.

name: PDF Candy
use: Free, but account required. Optional premium upgrades.
limits: Hourly limit for free tier file processing.

name: CloudConvert
use: Free and no account required. Optional premium upgrades.
limits: Up to 10 conversions per day. More requires purchase.

name: Capitol Trades
description: See all trades made by US senators.
use: Completely free to use, no account required.

name: FreeLearningList
description: A ranked list of the best free educational resources.
use: Completely free to use, no account required.

name: FlowCV
description: Create a free professional resume online.
use: Free, but account required. Optional premium upgrades.
limits: First resume free, thereafter payment required.

name: QuillBot
description: Online text tools to paraphrase, check or summarize.
use: Free and no account required. Optional premium upgrades.
limits: No usage limit. Some features restricted.

name: Atlas Obscura
description: A guide to hidden travel gems.
use: Completely free to use, no account required.

name: TinyWOW
description: A collection of 272 useful online tools.
use: Completely free to use, no account required.

name: Ostagram
description: AI tool to create stylized images.
use: Free to use, but account required.
limits: No reported usage limit or restrictions.

name: LearnAnything
description: Educational resources for hundreds of topics.
use: Completely free to use, no account required.
